concept.title: Running import and export procedures from JDBC
concept.shortdesc: You can run import and export procedures from a JDBC program.

keywords.indexterm: import and export proceduresrunning from JDBC

conbody.p: The following code fragment shows how you might call the SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_EXPORT_TABLE procedure from a Java program. In this example, the procedure exports the data in the staff table in the default schema to the staff.dat file. A percentage (%) character is used to specify the column delimiter.
